title: Ananda dEvi anugraham
sahitya:
Ananda dEvi anugraham dEhi ambA mAm pAhi adbhuta giri yuvati bhagavati


anupallavi

  prANAdhikAri purAri manOhari dAnavavairi giridhAri sahOdari


caraNam    pacamI pancavakAra pUjAkrta bhakta niranjani bhavabhaya bhanjani
kOLa prakAshini kONa nivAsini kulaguru bhAskara rAjapUjita rANi
				(madhyamakAla)
vEgavati tIravilAsini mAgamArtha navarAtri suvAsini 
mOgapradAyini karatala vallaki gAnAmrta varSiNi sadA parAm-
		(underlined words are in madhyamakAla)
